page.title: 12Farms, Pitreavie.
page.content: Forming part of our landscape there are several farms, nearly all west of Pitcorthie. The most northern farm in our area is the Grange. It has wheat and hay and it also has milking cows. Nobody lives at this farm but it is still kept running by a man who has a cowshed. South from the Grange farming goes on a t Easter Gellet and there is also a Wester Gellet just south from that. Both of these farms have crops and cows. Go east from Wester Gellet and you come to Leckerstone Farm, which has mainly hay and cereal crops such as barley. The only other farm in our area is Blackhall Farm, which again has mainly hay and cereal crops.
